package.description: This package contains GMapping, from OpenSlam, with a ROS wrapper. This package builds a binary, slam_gmapping, which can be used in a ROS system to provide a running pose estimate and an occupany grid map, given pose-stamped laser scans.
package.author: Giorgio Grisetti, Cyrill Stachniss, Wolfram Burgard; ROS wrapper by Brian Gerkey
